meanings.sent1: The yielding tree bore delicious fruits.
meanings.sent2: The yielding soil was perfect for growing crops.
meanings.sent3: The yielding sun generously shared its warmth with everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her yielding nature made her a great team player.
meanings.sent5: The yielding clouds poured rain on the thirsty land.

meanings.sent1: The yielding door opened easily with a gentle push.
meanings.sent2: The yielding mattress conformed to his body shape.
meanings.sent3: The yielding balloon popped when squeezed too hard.
meanings.sent4: His yielding resolve crumbled in the face of temptation.
meanings.sent5: The yielding bridge swayed under the weight of the passing trucks.

meanings.sent1: The yielding branches swayed in the wind.
meanings.sent2: She had a yielding attitude and was open to new ideas.
meanings.sent3: The yielding rubber band stretched easily around the box.
meanings.sent4: His yielding schedule allowed for last-minute changes.
meanings.sent5: The yielding fabric draped beautifully over the furniture.
